name: RangeFill
description: Represents the background of a range object.

properties.name: color
properties.description: HTML color code representing the color of the border line, of the form #RRGGBB (e.g. "FFA500") or as a named HTML color (e.g. "orange")

properties.name: tintAndShade
properties.description: Returns or sets a double that lightens or darkens a color for Range Fill, the value is between -1 (darkest) and 1 (brightest), with 0 for the original color.

properties.name: patternTintAndShade
properties.description: Returns or sets a double that lightens or darkens a pattern color for Range Fill, the value is between -1 (darkest) and 1 (brightest), with 0 for the original color.

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Gets or sets the pattern of a Range.

properties.name: patternColor
properties.description: Sets HTML color code representing the color of the Range pattern, of the form #RRGGBB (e.g. "FFA500") or as a named HTML color (e.g. "orange").
